SELECT MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.MS_SI_ALLOWANCE_ID , MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.NAME , MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.CONTENTS , MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.TARGET_VESSEL , MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.DEPARTMENT , MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.ALLOWANCE , MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.SHOW_ORDER , MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.DISTRIBUTION_FLAG , MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.DELETE_FLAG , MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.SEND_FLAG , MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.VESSEL_ID , MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.DATA_NO , MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.USER_KEY , MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.RENEW_DATE , MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.TS
FROM MS_SI_ALLOWANCE
WHERE MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.DELETE_FLAG = 0 ORDER BY MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.SHOW_ORDER, MS_SI_ALLOWANCE.NAME

INSERT INTO MS_SI_ALLOWANCE( MS_SI_ALLOWANCE_ID , NAME , CONTENTS , TARGET_VESSEL , DEPARTMENT , ALLOWANCE , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , SHOW_ORDER , DISTRIBUTION_FLAG , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( nextval('SEQ_MS_SI_ALLOWANCE_ID') , :NAME , :CONTENTS , :TARGET_VESSEL , :DEPARTMENT , :ALLOWANCE , :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , :SHOW_ORDER , :DISTRIBUTION_FLAG , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_SI_ALLOWANCE SET NAME = :NAME , CONTENTS = :CONTENTS , TARGET_VESSEL = :TARGET_VESSEL , DEPARTMENT = :DEPARTMENT , ALLOWANCE = :ALLOWANCE , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID = :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , SHOW_ORDER = :SHOW_ORDER , DISTRIBUTION_FLAG =:DISTRIBUTION_FLAG , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS WHERE MS_SI_ALLOWANCE_ID = :MS_SI_ALLOWANCE_ID AND TS = :TS
